sentences.en: A patient will usually listen to the doctor's advice and act on it.
sentences.cn: 患者通常都会遵照医嘱行事。

sentences.en: a thoughtless act
sentences.cn: 轻率的举动

sentences.en: act out a story.
sentences.cn: 连说带比划地讲将故事

sentences.en: an act of Parliament
sentences.cn: 议会法令

sentences.en: Despite his illegal act, few people think badly of him.
sentences.cn: 尽管他干了违法的事情，但很少有人认为他不好。

sentences.en: Did those directors act in the best interests of their club?
sentences.cn: 那些董事行事时是以他们俱乐部的最大利益为出发点吗？

sentences.en: Every person stood to applaud his unforgettable act of courage.
sentences.cn: 所有人起立为他不可磨灭的英勇之举鼓掌。

sentences.en: He’s been acting strangely ever since his Mom died.
sentences.cn: 自从母亲死后，他的行为一直很怪。

sentences.en: I arrived at the theatre late and missed the first act.
sentences.cn: 我到剧场时晚了，错过了第一幕。

sentences.en: I first started acting when I was 12 years old.
sentences.cn: 我12岁开始演戏。

sentences.en: I refuse to act that way when my kids fight.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子们打起架来时，我不会那样做。

sentences.en: It was imperative that he act as naturally as possible.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是他要做到尽可能自然。

sentences.en: Language interpretation is the whole point of the act of reading.
sentences.cn: 阅读行为中关键在于对语言的理解。

sentences.en: My left knee acts up in damp weather. Her arthritis is acting up again.
sentences.cn: 我的左膝一到阴湿天气就犯病。她的关节炎又犯了

sentences.en: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation.
sentences.cn: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

sentences.en: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.cn: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.en: Power is in some measure an act of will.
sentences.cn: 权力在某种程度上是意志的表现。

sentences.en: She confessed to her parents her desire to act.
sentences.cn: 她向父母坦言了自己想演戏的愿望。

sentences.en: Stress may act as a trigger for these illnesses.
sentences.cn: 压力可能会成为引发这些疾病的原因。

sentences.en: the beginning of Act 3
sentences.cn: 第三幕开场

sentences.en: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.cn: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.en: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.cn: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.en: The movie is very well acted.
sentences.cn: 这部影片演得非常好。

sentences.en: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.cn: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

sentences.en: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.cn: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.en: The President described the disaster as an act of God.
sentences.cn: 总统将这场灾难说成是天灾。

sentences.en: The Sex Discrimination Act has not eliminated discrimination in employment.
sentences.cn: 《反性别歧视法》并未根除工作中的歧视。

sentences.en: the thieves were caught in the act.
sentences.cn: 窃贼们被当场抓住。

sentences.en: There are many people who still find the act of abortion abhorrent.
sentences.cn: 仍有很多人对堕胎行为表示厌恶。

sentences.en: They acted unreasonably when they turned down Jill’s application.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝了吉尔的申请，这样做没道理。

sentences.en: they photographed him in the act of reading other people's mail.
sentences.cn: 他们拍下了他私看他人信件的行为过程。

sentences.en: This Human Rights Act is enforceable in the ordinary courts.
sentences.cn: 这项《人权法案》适用于普通法庭。

sentences.en: wanted to act out his theory.
sentences.cn: 想在行动中实践他的理论

words.tran_cn: 化学线作用的；化学线的
积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的
光化性，[光] 光化度；[化学] 光化作用
行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节
主观能动性；活动积极性
使激活；使活动起来；有生气（activate的过去分词）
刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性

phrases.phrase: a hard (或 tough) act to follow
phrases.tran_cn: 难以取得的成就（或成绩）
冲动行事：不知不觉中公开地表示（例如，无意识的冲动）
【非正式用语】 疾病发作：一段时间的平静之后变得活跃或令人讨厌
当场抓住（或发现）某人做坏事
改进举止：改进某人的举止或表现

phrases.phrase: get (或 be) in on the act
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（为获得利益或有利条件而）加入（或参与）（活动），插一手
加入，参与：中途加入到进行中的活动、项目或形势
(非正式)（使自己的生活处事）有头绪；有条有理地行事
[古语]即将，正要(与to和不定式连用)

trans.tran_cn: 行为，行动，法案，（戏剧等）一幕，表演，假装，演出者
行动，表现，奉行，假装，扮演（角色），充当，起作用，代表
trans.tran_en: to perform in a play or film
to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
to perform in a play or film
